name: osrm_map_puller
description: This is npm scripts and a Dockerfile to stand up OSRM

scripts.download: npm run download:pbfclean -s  && npm run download:pbfget
scripts.download:pbfclean: if [ -d data -a -d data/osrm ]; then find ./data/osrm -name $npm_package_config_geofabrik_download -mtime +30 -delete; fi
scripts.download:pbfget: npm run download:pbfdir -s && if [ ! -e data/osrm/$npm_package_config_geofabrik_download ]; then curl --create-dirs http://download.geofabrik.de/$npm_package_config_geofabrik_download -o data/osrm/$npm_package_config_geofabrik_download; fi
scripts.download_na: npm run download:pbfclean -s  && npm run download:pbfget
scripts.download_na:pbfclean: if [ -d data -a -d data/osrm ]; then find ./data/osrm -name $npm_package_config_geofabrik_northamerica -mtime +30 -delete; fi
scripts.download_na:pbfget: npm run download:pbfdir -s && if [ ! -e data/osrm/$npm_package_config_geofabrik_download ]; then curl --create-dirs http://download.geofabrik.de/$npm_package_config_geofabrik_northamerica -o data/osrm/$npm_package_config_geofabrik_download; fi
scripts.osrm: npm run osrm:extract_network && npm run osrm:partition && npm run osrm:customize
scripts.osrm_polycut: npm run osrm:usapoly && npm run osrm:extract_network_usa && npm run osrm:partition_usa && npm run osrm:customize_usa
scripts.osrm:extract_network: if [ ! -e data/osrm/`echo $npm_package_config_geofabrik_download | cut -f 1 -d .`.osrm ]; then docker run -t -v $(pwd)/data/osrm:/data  osrm/osrm-backend:$npm_package_config_osrm_version osrm-extract -p /opt/car.lua /data/$npm_package_config_geofabrik_download; fi
scripts.osrm:contract: if [ ! -e data/osrm/`echo $npm_package_config_geofabrik_download | cut -f 1 -d .`.osrm.hsgr ]; then docker run -t -v $(pwd)/data/osrm:/data osrm/osrm-backend:$npm_package_config_osrm_version osrm-contract /data/`echo $npm_package_config_geofabrik_download | cut -f 1 -d .`.osrm; fi && echo "OSRM_GRAPH=/data/`echo $npm_package_config_geofabrik_download | cut -f 1 -d .`.osrm" > .env
scripts.osrm:contract_poly: docker run -t -v $(pwd)/data/osrm:/data osrm/osrm-backend:$npm_package_config_osrm_version osrm-contract /data/`echo $npm_package_config_poly_output | cut -f 1 -d .`.osrm && echo "OSRM_GRAPH=/data/`echo $npm_package_config_poly_output | cut -f 1 -d .`.osrm" > .env
scripts.build_osrm_server: MAPDATE=$(stat -c '%y' data/osrm/$npm_package_config_geofabrik_download | cut -d '.' -f 1 | sed 's/[[:space:]]/T/') docker build -t jmarca/osrm-preloaded-backend:${MAPDATE} --build-arg osrm_version=$npm_package_config_osrm_version  -f Dockerfile.server .
scripts.deploy_osrm_backend: npm run download && npm run osrm && npm run build_osrm_server && MAPDATE=$(stat -c '%y' data/osrm/$npm_package_config_geofabrik_download | cut -d '.' -f 1 | sed 's/[[:space:]]/T/') docker run -d -p $npm_package_config_server_port:5000  jmarca/osrm-preloadeed-backend:${MAPDATE} osrm-routed --algorithm mld /data/$(echo $npm_package_config_geofabrik_download | cut -f 1 -d .).osrm
scripts.deploy_osrm_backend_usa: npm run build_polytool && npm run download && npm run osrm_polycut && docker run -d -p $npm_package_config_server_port:5000 -v $(pwd)/data/osrm:/data osrm/osrm-backend:$npm_package_config_osrm_version osrm-routed --algorithm mld /data/$npm_package_config_usa_output

author: James E. Marca
